subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky forward Nerlens Noel will enter the N.B.A. draft. Noel, a 6-foot-10 freshman, is projected to be a lottery pick despite sustaining a season-ending knee injury Feb. 12
snippet: Kentucky forward Nerlens Noel will enter the N.B.A. draft. Noel, a 6-foot-10 freshman, is projected to be a lottery pick despite sustaining a season-ending knee injury Feb. 12
